exclusion_patterns.description: Indicates exclusion as it pertains to financial matters unrelated to medical research.
Indicates exclusion as it relates to literary studies rather than medical content.
Indicates exclusion as it pertains to ecological issues outside the scope of prostate cancer research.

inclusion_patterns.description: Indicates inclusion as it directly relates to the study of prostate cancer outcomes.
Indicates inclusion as it pertains to predictive analytics in medical research.
Indicates inclusion as it directly relates to clinical guidelines for prostate cancer detection.
